name: SuperDice (ch4mbam, Ikram Saedi <3)
description:
You are a dice that needs to get past all your enemies and the acid sitting around to finish the game! At every checkpoint, you get to roll the dice to get a new special ability to help you succeed. 

Controls:

- AD / left & right arrow keys for moving left & right

- Space or W to jump

- Glock: use cursor to aim, click to shoot.

Have fun! <3

Credits:

- Ground, bullet & background object assets: Kenney

- Music:  David Fesliyan

- The rest is all us! :D
